function.description: Action function. ALLI will move upward the given distance.
Action function. ALLI will move downward the given distance.
Action function. ALLI will move forward the given distance.
Action function. ALLI will move backward the given distance.
Action function. ALLI will move left the given distance.
Action function. ALLI will move right the given distance.

parameter.name: angle
parameter.paramDescription: Size of the angle ALLI will turn left by, possible values are [90, 180, 270].

function.description: Action function. ALLI will turn left by the angle specified.

parameter.name: angle
parameter.paramDescription: Size of the angle ALLI will turn right by, possible values are [90, 180, 270].

function.description: Action function. ALLI will turn right by the angle specified.
Action function. If ALLI is in the space above the package, they will pick it up.
Action function. If ALLI has already picked up a package, they will drop the package in the space below them. ALLI can only drop a package if it is 1 space above a surface.

parameter.name: direction
parameter.paramDescription: The direction of the sensors that ALLI will use. The possible values are ["up", "down", "left", "right", "forward", "backward", "pickup"].

function.description: Sensor function. Returns the name of the nearest object relative to ALLI's current position in the direction specified. ALLI can use their sensors for a distance less than 5 spaces. If there is not an object in the direction specified, the function will return None.

parameter.name: direction
parameter.paramDescription: The direction of the sensors that ALLI will use. The possible values are ["up", "down", "left", "right", "forward", "backward"].

function.description: Sensor function. Returns the distance to the nearest object relative to ALLI's current position in the direction specified. ALLI can use its sensors for a distance less than 5 spaces. If there is no object in the sensor direction specified, -1 will be returned. If ALLI is next to the object in the direction specified, 0 will be returned.
Sensor function. Returns the time remaining.

parameter.name: coordinate
parameter.paramDescription: The co-ordinate position of ALLI. The possible values are ["x", "y", "z"].

function.description: Sensor function. Returns the x, y or z function of ALLI.
Sensor function. Returns the rotation of ALLI. The possible values are [-180, -90, 0, 90]
Sensor function. Returns true if ALLI is carrying a package and returns false if ALLI is not carrying a package.
